sentences.sentence: Could I exchange my nature with any other creature, I fain would be such a happy little lark!
sentences.translation: 如果我变成其他动物，我愿意做一只快乐的小云雀！

sentences.sentence: I would fain do as you ask.
"I would fain know if I am destined for so glorious a career," cried the Tree, rejoicing.
sentences.translation: “也许某一天我也注定要做一件这样光荣的事情！”枞树高兴地叫道。
